website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for having everything consumers want in a set of running boards: durability, easy installation, good looks, and a mid-range price.
pros: Accommodates most vehicles with versatile style and fit
Aluminum frame is complemented by black moulding
cons: A custom mount kit is required to fit your vehicle, and it doesn't come with the set

customer_reviews.title: They look great but...
customer_reviews.text: These look great on my 2017 buick enclave. It took about 90 minutes to do myself. The only reason I give 4 stars is because the box was crushed on one end and all the staples securing the box were either unattached or missing. Also I was missing a bolt from the brackets which is explained in my review of them. But they do look great so I am happy. Update..Missing bolt was sent via priority mail with no problems. I am upgrading my review to 5 stars because of the great customer service from Westin.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Westin Step Boards looking good on my Buick Enclave!
customer_reviews.text: Great product looks good on my 2011 Buick Enclave used Mounting Kit Westin 27-1835. I like the side Chrome look. But there was some tweaking that needed to occur. A styrofoam block was pulled apart to add filling in the gaps between the board and the plastic shield also to stabilize a clip which kept sliding back and fourth. Now it feels nice and solid and not producing a rattling sound. Not sure how long this product will last...this is questionable. Meanwhile I plan on enjoying my Westin Step Boards.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina W

customer_reviews.title: fits and looks awesome on our 07 gmc envoy
customer_reviews.text: would've had a better experience if I could've gotten the right brackets! they kept sending me the wrong ones so just ended up drilling new holes to make the wrong brackets work. over all it turned out great and im finished!!
customer_reviews.author: barry wood

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Had them on my '13 Explorer for almost a year now. So far steps are still sturdy and look great. Customer service is lacking. One bolt was defective cause the threads were messed up. Emailed them and never heard back from them. So decided to get one myself. Installation was a 6 on a scale of 10. 10 being extremely hard. Instruction were decent. All pieces that was needed for the install were provided.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: These running boards look very nice installed on the Toyota Highlander
customer_reviews.text: These running boards look very nice installed on the Toyota Highlander . They are streamline and have very little exposed while the door is closed, but when you open the door you have a good step area. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Embrey

customer_reviews.title: Mounted as per instructions... all parts should ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted as per instructions... all parts should be laid out and studied as there are left and right_front and back parts and all should be re-marked for quick assembly reference; and all left somewhat loose for final alignment and tightening!!! Other bloggers were very helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice running boards
customer_reviews.text: These were a great buy , as described and very easy to install. I had shopped the entire net and found the best price here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beaven

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp looking on my 2015 Ford Explorer. Used ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp looking on my 2015 Ford Explorer. Used the Westin 27-1965 running board mounting kit (purchased separately) to install them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, plenty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, plenty sturdy. They are a little bit short for my taste on a 2014 GMC Acadia, but my wife lives then and it's her car, so they're fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cohagen

customer_reviews.title: To small for a 2012 Acadia (Read full review)
customer_reviews.text: These are great boards!! Look really good. Took me 2 hours to install. But they are too short for a 2012 Acadia. About 69 inches long not 73. They are about 6 inches to short on each side to cover the full length of the doors. I am going to trade them in and order the 27-6130 which are 79 inches. Amazon has been fantastic with the return and have been so helpful. I could not be happier with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TCM

customer_reviews.title: Make sure that you get the correct brackets for the make of vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these steps on a Ford Explorer for a lady friend who was very satisfied with the steps. My only problem was getting the correct brackets to install these steps on the Ford. After receiving two sets of brackets that did not fit, I ordered from a different supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: other than that they look great.
customer_reviews.text: a bit short for our car but already installed. Be sure to measure before ordering, other than that they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Makes it much easier for my short legs to get in my Enclave and also my mother. I had to carry a stool in the car for her to be able to get in now I don't. They also make my Enclave look sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: excellent fit 2013 Acadia
customer_reviews.text: great fit and the wife loves them!! be sure to order the installation brackets separate you must have them easy install about 1 1/2 hours in the garage!!
customer_reviews.author: thomas a. trimboli

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: When we bought our new Ford Edge, we soon realized we needed a little "boost" getting into it, as it has the optional 20" wheels and sits nearly as high as our F250. These really help these two senior citizens get aboard. Installation was relatively easy.
customer_reviews.author: jim@OKC

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable quality! Perfect for my 2014 4Runner Limited.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 4Runner Limited! There are (2) running boards in the kit. Installation instructions come with your vehicle specific mounting brackets (sold separately.) The correct mounting kit for 2014 4Runner Limited is 27-1945. Instructions are clear, detailed, and straight forward. People that don't have basic assembly skills shouldn't review products. The rolled-edge design of the boards compliment the 2014 4Runner Limited perfectly, and the step area is almost 6-inces. IMO, these are MUCH higher quality than the OEM offering.
customer_reviews.author: J. Veazey

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product when it at the time showed ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product when it at the time showed it fit my 2017 GMC Acadia SLT (I have screen shot to prove this). When I had to return it (huge nuisance), I was not reimbursed shipping, which is not right since this was incorrectly listed product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Helenius

customer_reviews.title: Best running boards for my Jeep Grand Cherokee
customer_reviews.text: A great addition for my Jeep Grand Cherokee!!!! These running boards fit great on my vehicle. They are tasteful and sturdy!!!

customer_reviews.title: does not fit 2002 grand cherokee limited

product_meta.title: Westin 27-6620 Brite Aluminum Step Board
product_meta.description: Westin Sure-Grip Running Boards are straight step style designs that are available in six universal lengths (54 inch, 69 inch, 72 inch, 79 inch, 85inch, 93 inch) and feature a cradle mounting technique. Universal running boards require a 27-series vehicle specific mounting kit (sold separately). Sure-Grip Running Boards are made of an extruded aluminum base board and feature a slip resistant rubber step area and stylized molded end-caps for a finished look. For added function, Westin offers an optional Sure-Grip Running Board Light Kit PN# 27-6000 (sold separately) to light the step area when doors are in the open position. Sure-Grip Running Boards carry a 5 year warranty for Brite, Brushed, and Black finish.
feature_bullets: Westin Sure Grip Aluminum Running Boards are custom made to fit your truck or SUV
However, you must order the mounting kit (sold sepaerately) to complete the installation.
Sure Grip Running Boards boast a rubberized step surface for secure footing in any weather.
Westin Sure Grip Running Boards are crafted from 4"-wide extruded aluminum
Just choose 1 of three finishes Brite Aluminum, Brushed Aluminum or Black.
